se.miun.itm.input.util.sql

Class DatabaseUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.miun.itm.input.util.sql.AbstractDatabaseConnector
      • se.miun.itm.input.util.sql.DatabaseUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseConnector

    public class DatabaseUpdater
extends AbstractDatabaseConnector
    Used for updating Document:s and Exportable:s in SQL databases.
    Author:
    Stefan Karlsson

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseUpdater

        public DatabaseUpdater(java.sql.Connection conn)
                throws SQLInPUTException
        Constructs a DatabaseUpdater that updates Document:s and Exportable:s in the designated database.
        Parameters:
        conn - A connection to the database in which objects shall be updated.
        Throws:
        SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public boolean update(se.miun.itm.input.model.Document doc)
               throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                      SQLInPUTException
        Updates the specified InPUT XML document in the connected database.
        Parameters:
        doc - An InPUT XML document that has the same ID and type as the one that shall be updated and that contains the new content.
        Returns:
        true if the document was successfully updated, or false if it doesn't have the same ID and type as any of the InPUT XML documents in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If the document isn't an InPUT XML document, or if it's dependent on an document that cannot be found.
        SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

      • update

        public boolean update(se.miun.itm.input.aspects.Exportable exportable)
               throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                      SQLInPUTException
        Updates the specified Exportable in the connected database.
        Parameters:
        exportable - An Exportable that has the same ID and type as the one that shall be updated and that contains the new content.
        Returns:
        true if the Exportable was successfully updated, or false if it doesn't have the same ID and type as any of the Exportable:s in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If the Exportable isn't a design, design space, code-mapping object, experiment or IInPUT, or if it's dependent on code mappings that cannot be found.
        SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

      • updateDesign

        private boolean updateDesign(se.miun.itm.input.model.design.IDesign design)
                      throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                             SQLInPUTException
        Updates the specified design in the connected database.
        Parameters:
        design - A design that has the same ID as the one that shall be updated and that contains the new content.
        Returns:
        true if the design was successfully updated, or false if it doesn't have the same ID as any of the designs in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If the design is dependent on code mappings that cannot be found.
        SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

      • updateExperiment

        private boolean updateExperiment(se.miun.itm.input.IExperiment experiment)
                          throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                                 SQLInPUTException
        Updates the specified experiment in the connected database.
        Parameters:
        experiment - An experiment that has the same ID as the one that shall be updated and that contains the new content.
        Returns:
        true if the experiment was successfully updated, or false if it doesn't have the same ID as any of the experiments in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If the experiment is dependent on code mappings that cannot be found.
        SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

      • updateFramework

        private boolean updateFramework(Framework fw)
                         throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                                SQLInPUTException
        Updates the specified framework in the connected database.
        Parameters:
        fw - A framework that has the same ID as the one that shall be updated and that contains the new/updated elements.
        Returns:
        true if the framework was successfully updated, or false if it doesn't have the same ID as any of the frameworks in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If any of the code-mapped design spaces cannot be found.
        SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

      • updateInPUT

        private boolean updateInPUT(se.miun.itm.input.IInPUT inPUT)
                     throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                            SQLInPUTException
        Updates the specified IInPUT in the connected database.
        Parameters:
        inPUT - An IInPUT that has the same ID as the one that shall be updated and that contains the new content.
        Returns:
        true if the IInPUT was successfully updated, or false if it doesn't have the same ID as any of the IInPUT:s in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If the IInPUT is dependent on code mappings that cannot be found.
        SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.
